extension.summary: Comskip detects commercial breaks from a video stream. It can be used for post-processing recordings
extension.description: ComSkip is a free video commercial detector. It is a console application that reads a video file and analyses the content based on a large amount of configurable parameters. After analysis it generates a file in various possible formats containing the location of the commercials inside the video file. Comskip can read MPEG and h.264 video, MPEG2, AC3 and AAC audio from PS , TS and dvr-ms files upto HD resolution (max 2000x1200) at 25fps (PAL) and 29.97fps (NTSC).
